titles.title: Sierra Vista Subwatershed Feasibility Study Authorization Act
To authorize the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Bureau of Reclamation, to conduct a feasibility study of the Sierra Vista Subwatershed in the State of Arizona.
Sierra Vista Subwatershed Feasibility Study Authorization Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

bill.summary: Sierra Vista Subwatershed Feasibility Study Authorization Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Bureau of Reclamation, to conduct a water augmentation alternatives feasibility study to identify alternatives for project implementation and construction that would be likely to balance water use within the Sierra Vista Subwatershed, including Fort Huachuca, in Arizona, with the needs of the San Pedro Riparian National Conservation Area.
